verses.name: Leviticus 23:41
verses.text: And ye shall keep it a feast unto the Lord seven days in the year. It shall be a statute for ever in your generations: ye shall celebrate it in the seventh month.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:42
verses.text: Ye shall dwell in booths seven days; all that are Israelites born shall dwell in booths:

verses.name: Leviticus 23:43
verses.text: That your generations may know that I made the children of Israel to dwell in booths, when I brought them out of the land of Egypt: I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:44
verses.text: And Moses declared unto the children of Israel the feasts of the Lord.
